Articles.Content:
This short film is the second installment in a series of videos I'm recording that feature starship designs that I have been using in my KSP V1.0.4 career mode. Originally I had a more ambitions agenda for this clip covering six contracts and more interaction with other vessels but the limitation of a three and a half minute rock song forced me to cut back on a lot of the footage (even though I edited the song to get more time). The result is actually much better than I anticipated so I'm not worried, and some of the additional footage may be used in subsequent videos. (To see the previous video follow this LINK)

JR

Edit: I didn't realize I had a sticky on my previous video, going forward I'll be linking all my videos there...

Edited November 3, 2015 by Jolly_Roger
